questions.question: Will rain effect your outside services?
questions.answer: Rain only effects outside services if it's raining while we are applying pesticide. If it's raining we will not carry out a treatment. If rain has stopped then we can continue the treatment.

questions.question: Do I have to leave my home when you provide service?
questions.answer: In most cases you won't have to leave your home, but you may have to leave the area where your pest technician is working.

why.summary: It’s our goal to provide you with superior protection and elimination of unwanted pests.  We offer reliable, dependable and economical commercial and residential services.

reasons.title: Exceptional Experience
reasons.detail: We have over 20 years of knowledge and experience in all areas of pest control. Our technicians are well trained, and happy to review all aspects of your service and treatment.

reasons.title: Personal Service
reasons.detail: As a small, family company, we offer a personal level of service. We have known many of our customers since we opened in 1993.

reasons.title: Competitive Prices
reasons.detail: Our pricing is fair and competitive. To help you save money in the long run we offer year-round or seasonal packages to rid your home of rodents, ants, spiders and other insects.
